name: IDENTITY_HQA_ID
description: THE IDENTITY_HQA_ID table contains the system Master Person Index (MPI) ID numbers for questionnaire answers. Each questionnaire answer may have mutliple MPI ID's. A line number is used to identify each identification number for a questionnaire answer.

columns.name: ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the answer record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MPI_ID_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The ID Type (IIT) ID of the questionnaire answer (HQA) record.

columns.name: MPI_ID_TYPE_ID_ID_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ID Type.

columns.name: MPI_ID
columns.description: Identity ID assigned to the questionnaire answer (HQA) record.

columns.name: MPI_FROM_DATE
columns.description: The effective "from" date for the questionnaire answer Identity ID.

columns.name: MPI_TO_DATE
columns.description: The effective "to" date for questionnaire answer Identity ID.
